caption.title: Pretreatment with SEB selectively enhances primary NP 147- and HA 518-specific T CD8 responses elicited by SEQ12 immunization.
caption.p: (A) BALB/c mice (n = 4/group) were injected i.p. with PBS or with 50 μg SEB three days before they were immunized i.p. with SEQ12. At the peak of the primary response ( i. e., on day 7 post-immunization), T CD8 recognizing the indicated epitopes were enumerated by MHC I tetramer staining (B) and by ICS for IFN-γ (C). Error bars represent SEM. * and ** denote statistically significant differences with p<0.05 and p<0.01, respectively, which were determined using an unpaired Student’s t-test
